inclusion.criterion: able to cooperate with the technician performing the procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: non-ST Elevation Myocardial Infarction (STEMI) Electrocardiogram (EKG) without acute changes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: medically necessary appointment for CCTA for the purpose of evaluation of coronary stenosis for the provisional diagnoses of chest pain or angina or angina equivalent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to take nitroglycerin and beta blockers
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of coronary stenting or coronary artery bypass graft
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe or end stage renal disease as diagnosed as estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR)<50
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He underwent Carotid U/S that showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis, L>R. Angiography revealed an 80% stenosis of the R ICA and a 90% L ICA stenosis.
